name: Party Games - Psych Outwit
description:
Don't know what to play at the party? Is everyone playing their own mobile phone? With Party Games, this is no longer a problem. Just let you guys enjoy the party!

Party Games contains four games: Charades, Truth or Dare, Mafia and Who’s Spy.

1. Charades
This is a very interesting guessing game. Game play is very simple. One person describes, and another person guesses.
2. Truth or Dare
Truth: the winner asked the loser a question, the loser must answer truthfully.
Dare: the winner asked the loser to do anything for fun.
3. Mafia
This is a classical reasoning game for 5-16 people. The best judge tool is provided. Beginners can also be a good judge
4. Who’s Spy
This is a competition of expression ability, knowledge and imagination, a new option of games at the party.

Features:
- Rich and varied party games in single ONE application
- The gameplay is simple, good for both young and old.
- Suit different people and different scenarios.No more hanging about at the party!
- Massive game content and endless fun

Support & Feedback: gzyappservice@gmail.com
